ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions that wrap popular phylogenetic software for sequence alignment, masking of sequence alignments, and estimation of phylogenies and ancestral character states.
Functions that wrap popular phylogenetic software for sequence alignment, masking of sequence alignments, and estimation of phylogenies and ancestral character states.

name: r-ips
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.0.12" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ips
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ips_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ips/ips_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1cb2de135ba9927cc1984aa323300d0df2b64f37f0928df57cea6f922a55da6e

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-xml
    - r-ape
    - r-data.table
    - r-phangorn
    - r-plyr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-xml
    - r-ape
    - r-data.table
    - r-phangorn
    - r-plyr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ips')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ips')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ips
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Functions that wrap popular phylogenetic software for sequence alignment, masking of sequence alignments, and estimation of phylogenies and ancestral character states.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - brendanf

# Package: ips
# Version: 0.0.11
# Date: 2019-06-20
# Title: Interfaces to Phylogenetic Software in R
# Authors@R: c( person("Christoph", "Heibl", email = "christoph.heibl@gmx.net", role = c("aut", "cre")), person("Natalie", "Cusimano", role = c("aut")), person("Franz-Sebastian", "Krah", role = c("aut")))
# Depends: R (>= 3.2.0), ape
# Imports: phangorn, plyr, seqinr, XML
# Description: Functions that wrap popular phylogenetic software for sequence alignment, masking of sequence alignments, and estimation of phylogenies and ancestral character states.
# License: GPL-3
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Packaged: 2019-07-04 15:51:55 UTC; heibl
# Author: Christoph Heibl [aut, cre], Natalie Cusimano [aut], Franz-Sebastian Krah [aut]
# Maintainer: Christoph Heibl <christoph.heibl@gmx.net>
# Date/Publication: 2019-07-04 16:30:03 UTC
